bibl.title: What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria?

bibl.seg: EMPEREUR Jean-Yves, The Destruction of the Library of Alexandria: An Archaeological Viewpoint.

Mostafa EL-ABBADI and Omnia Mounir FATHALLAH (Edd.), What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria? = Library of the Written Word. 3. The Manuscript World. 1 (Leiden - Boston, 2008) pp. 75-88, 11 figg.
